#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,p,n=1,a1[100],a2[100];
    cin>>t;
    while(n<=t)
    {
        cin>>p;
        for(int i=0; i<p; i++)
            cin>>a1[i];
        for(int i=0; i<p; i++)
            cin>>a2[i];
        sort(a1,a1+p);
        sort(a2,a2+p);
        int i=0,k=0,count=0;
        while((i<p)&&(k<p))
        {
            if(a2[i]>=a1[k])
            {
                k++;
                count++;
                i++;
            }
            else
                i++;

        }

        cout<<count<<endl;
        n++;
    }
    return 0;
}
